title: Memorandum of Understanding to be entered into between Sri Lanka and Ruwanda  on Visa Exemption for Holders of Diplomatic and Official  Passports
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Wajira Abeywardena, the Minister of Internal & Home Affairs and Provincial Councils & Local Government, to enter into Memorandum of Understanding between Sri Lanka and Ruwanda on Visa Exemption for Holders of Diplomatic, Special and Official Passports, was approved by the Cabinet.
